title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 339 - Retirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 339 - Retirement

State Regulations

Title A - Membership in Retirement Systems (§ 339.1)

Title B - Voluntary Retirement (§ 339.2)

Title C - Retirement for Physical or Mental Incapacity (§ 339.3)

Title D - Privileges After Retirement (§ 339.4 to 339.7)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 339

Statutory authority: Education Law, §
355[2][b]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
